talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Hmm? Excuse me?


<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:ffff>If you're looking to <clr:0000>rent a sand seal<clr:ffff>, go
right ahead. Don't mind me.

I'm busy trying to figure out how I'll get
back to <clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff>.
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00>It's a bit hard to see it right now because
of the <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff> covering the desert...
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Look far in the distance. Do you see
that shrine peeking out above the
<clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff>?
That's where <clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff> is.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Shrines just like that one appeared all
over the world after the Upheaval.

Lucky for me tooâ€”if that one hadn't
shown up, I'd have completely lost sight
of <clr:0000>town<clr:ffff>.
Of course, it's <clr:0000>really hard to see<clr:ffff> inside
the <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff>, so it might be impossible
to reach town even with a sand seal.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>There's a scholar in Gerudo Town, you
know. Rotana is her name. She's been
really busy lately...
Which means I've taken on the job of
investigating these ruins!

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>The statues here are supposed to
represent the seven Gerudo heroines, so
you'd think there would be seven of them.
Where did the other two go?
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_01>What? <sp:5:0:0>Listen, it may look like I'm slacking
off or something, but that's not the case.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Even we Gerudo get tired working in the
freezing cold of the desert nights.

The best way to make it bearable is a nice
break every now and then.
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_01>What? <sp:5:0:0>Hey, it may look like I'm slacking
off, but I'm not!

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Even we Gerudo get tired working under
the blazing heat of this desert sun.

The best way to make it bearable is a nice
break every now and then.
talk0007:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>I want to hurry and wrap up this investigation.
The heroine statues are interesting...but I'm tired. 

Once I report back to Rotana, I can head straight
to the canteen and refresh with a delicious
Noble Pursuit...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0008:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>I was supposed to investigate those ruins too,
but trying to travel in the sand shroud was a
terrible idea.
Maybe I should just stay at <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar <clr:ffff>and
rest. It'd mean giving up getting back to town, but...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_01>What? <sp:5:0:0>Hey, it may look like I'm slacking
off, but I'm not!

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Even we Gerudo get tired working in the
desert. It's not exactly easy to move
around in all the sand...
The best way to make it bearable is a nice
break every now and then.
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal_00>What? You're also hoping to go to
<clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff>?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Voe aren't allowed inside the walls, so
even if you managed to get there, you'd
be turned away at the gate.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>That was some amazing sand-seal
steering!

It's exciting just to remember it!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>I really hope one day I'll become as good
as you...

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Maybe I should try getting a job at the sand-seal
rental shop when this is all said and done.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
